name: Are You Even a Comedian
description:
A comedian critic in heaps of debt, and he decides to speed through some odd people giving his ratings. But what he doesn't know is that all of these stand up comedians are failing too. This night JOINS TOGETHER the future of both the critic's and comedian's career. Made for the GMTK Game Jam.

CONTROLS:

Click -  to progress

Escape - Quit to Main Menu
